	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/d7684581d996c56e8a900e0a868e8d16.sol#52)

	- lastPlayed = now (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/d7684581d996c56e8a900e0a868e8d16.sol#56)
	- shuffle() (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/d7684581d996c56e8a900e0a868e8d16.sol#55)
